SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.IconStyleH: Select the type of icon you want
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.colorH: This accepts both RGB and RGBA (transparency) color codes
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.autoIconH: Overrides whatever icon is selected above.
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.iconScaleH: Initial scale setting for new icons.  1 = one grid square. Only applies on initial creation
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.uploadPathH: Path to store newly created icons in
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.fontFamilyH: Font family name from fonts.google.com. Leave blank for stock font
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.rebuildH: This will look for all note icons in the world, and if they are in auto mode, rebuild the images.  This can take a while if you have lots of map notes. It will automatically reload when complete.
AutoJournalIcon.partial_rebuild: Rebuild all icons, keeping their settings
AutoJournalIcon.full_rebuild: Rebuild all icons, overriding settings to global values
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.folderIconH: Set default icon name based on the folder name. e.g. Journals in a folder called 'Village' would get the village icon by default. Journal name matching has priority over folder name.
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.reg_alpha_space: A letter followed by a space (Q )
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.reg_alpha_dot: A letter followed by a period (Z.)
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.reg_custom_hint: Leave blank to disable. See README.md for more details
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.iconSampleTextH: Icon will be an Anchor if the text doesn't match any of the matching criteria
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.iconSettingsH: Configure the default icon style. All choices can be overridden on a per-icon basis.
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.regexSettingsH: Configure what types of journal names to auto apply to
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.iconFontSizeH: Default font size for the icon
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.autoCloseH: Automatically close the icon creation window for new icons that match the auto icon criteria.
SETTINGS.AutoJournalIcon.autoPageImageH: Automatically make an icon based on the first journal image page
